001
002package com.commercetools.api.json;
003
004import java.io.IOException;
005
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializerProvider;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ser.std.StdScalarSerializer;
009
010public class DoubleSerializer extends StdScalarSerializer<Double> {
011
012    static final long serialVersionUID = 0L;
013
014    public DoubleSerializer() {
015        super(Double.class);
016    }
017
018    public void serialize(Double value, JsonGenerator gen, SerializerProvider arg2) throws IOException {
019        if (value.intValue() == value)
020            gen.writeNumber(value.intValue());
021        else
022            gen.writeNumber(value);
023    }
024}
